div.div: Due to the Stay at Home orders and social distancing requirements caused by COVID-19, XCS is implementing changes to include: grading, student promotion/retention, graduation, commencement, and more.
The following email update about graduation was sent to the Xenia Community Schools on Thursday, April 23:
Intra-District Open Enrollment for the 2020/2021 school year is open!
